title: Quick Calc for Android Wear
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
description: Description:Fast and easy to use calculator designed for Android Wear Smartwatches with large buttons for accurate input. Supports addition(+), subtraction(-), multiplication(*), division(/), powers(^), and square root.How to use:Simply tap any of the 1 to 9 numbers to enter them, enter a 0 by swiping up. Any of the blue symbols can be inputted by pressing and holding on them. You can clear the read out by pressing and holding on the "C" or swipe down to backspace. To exit swipe left to right like normal.How to start:After the app is installed it will automatically sync to your Android Wear watch. Say "OK Google" "Start Quick Calc" on your Android Wear watch to start the calculator. You can also say "OK Google" "Start" and then pick it from the list of applications on your watch. If you don't want to talk at all to start the app then just tap on the screen and scroll down to "Start.." and then find "Quick Calculator".Settings:To access the settings swipe right to left. You can change the long press length any where from 0.9 second down to 0.15 seconds, if your fast. Also vibration can be turned up or down or off all together.Requirements:Requires an Android Wear device already paired with your Android 4.3+ device to sync the app to the watch. Once it is synced it can be run when not connected to your Android phone since this is a native app.Works with the Samsung Gear Live and LG G Smartwatches
descriptionHTML:
Description:
Fast and easy to use calculator designed for Android Wear Smartwatches with large buttons for accurate input. Supports addition(+), subtraction(-), multiplication(*), division(/), powers(^), and square root.


How to use:
Simply tap any of the 1 to 9 numbers to enter them, enter a 0 by swiping up. Any of the blue symbols can be inputted by pressing and holding on them. You can clear the read out by pressing and holding on the "C" or swipe down to backspace. To exit swipe left to right like normal.


How to start:
After the app is installed it will automatically sync to your Android Wear watch. Say "OK Google" "Start Quick Calc" on your Android Wear watch to start the calculator. You can also say "OK Google" "Start" and then pick it from the list of applications on your watch. If you don't want to talk at all to start the app then just tap on the screen and scroll down to "Start.." and then find "Quick Calculator".


Settings:
To access the settings swipe right to left. You can change the long press length any where from 0.9 second down to 0.15 seconds, if your fast. Also vibration can be turned up or down or off all together.


Requirements:
Requires an Android Wear device already paired with your Android 4.3+ device to sync the app to the watch. Once it is synced it can be run when not connected to your Android phone since this is a native app.


Works with the Samsung Gear Live and LG G Smartwatches
comments: Looks good on video but... it always crashes as soon as I try open it on my moto 360 :/
Developer please add this function. Will give 5 stars when I am able to add more than 2 numbers. A calculator should be able to add 44+645+33 I need this feature. I love the size of buttons.

Does What It Says Works great, and haven't had any issues with it. Being able to change the long press timer is awesome. Only wish that I could customize the don't colors, but that's just my own personal preferences. Great app as it is and very responsive devs ðŸ˜ƒ
Nice and solid app Nice and very solid works very well
Working Good App had sync issue which was resolved by developer within minutes of purchase. Great solution for wear on LG G watch. Nice layout with large enough keys.
Swipe down to delete I thought the delete function was missing but you just swipe down to delete. Thanks for the quick reply KastenTech.
recentChanges: * Fixed bug where swiping down to backspace wasn't working right after doing a long press.
* Long press and vibration defaults are shorter and added an extra option to each.
* Added new settings page which can be opened by swiping right to left.
- Includes long press time length and vibration settings.
- Button flash now works when "Wear Mini Launcher" is active.
- Left to right close swipe now shouldn't be triggered by mistake.
